title: cryptoaddictchie
author: cryptoaddictchie
content: So Ive seen this post from Twitter about zksync checker.https://byfishh.github.io/zk-flowKindly check your wallet to see how is the activity of your wallet for the airdrop. Important details are well ntoed there like number of transactions, volume, gas fee spend and even dapps that you interacted on the zkysync network. Hope this gotta be helpful for everyone doing farm there.PS: Feel free to share your screenshot and feedback hows the details on your part?

comments.author: Beparanf
comments.body: Quote from: cryptoaddictchie on June 04, 2023, 01:21:11 PMSo Ive seen this post from Twitter about zksync checker.https://byfishh.github.io/zk-flowKindly check your wallet to see how is the activity of your wallet for the airdrop. Important details are well ntoed there like number of transactions, volume, gas fee spend and even dapps that you interacted on the zkysync network. Hope this gotta be helpful for everyone doing farm there.PS: Feel free to share your screenshot and feedback hows the details on your part? Is there any pointers on what should be watch for the requirements to receive the airdrop. I have 1500$ on Zksync with 4 DEX use to buy and sell. I wonder how often should we make transaction to become eligible on airdrop.Also is transferring from Zksync wallet to Zksync wallet is allowed instead of using the bridge for transfer of ETH Zksync era? The bridge fee is very high and also the withdrawal outside the Zksync took 24hours before it bridge on Ethereum mainnet. Thanks for sharing this website.

comments.author: asriloni
comments.body: Quote from: Beparanf on June 04, 2023, 01:52:36 PMI have 1500$ on Zksync with 4 DEX use to buy and sell. I wonder how often should we make transaction to become eligible on airdrop.I have been doing it regularly a few times in a week. Avoid to spamming the transactions as it may be considered as sybil attack. Quote from: Beparanf on June 04, 2023, 01:52:36 PMAlso is transferring from Zksync wallet to Zksync wallet is allowed instead of using the bridge for transfer of ETH Zksync era? The bridge fee is very high and also the withdrawal outside the Zksync took 24hours before it bridge on Ethereum mainnet. Thanks for sharing this website.It will be far better to be done through official bridge. Bridging through official bridge is a must. It could become the main qualification. That's what im thinking about that. That's why people agreed to pay the high fees for bridging from ethereum to the zksync through official bridge.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: Beparanf on June 04, 2023, 01:52:36 PMIs there any pointers on what should be watch for the requirements to receive the airdrop. I have 1500$ on Zksync with 4 DEX use to buy and sell. I wonder how often should we make transaction to become eligible on airdrop.I'll give based on what I assume would be. I think just use the dex or any dapps weekly or even so 3 to 4x a month, you can try to add some liquidity also. Not sure thoufh if they have stable pairing for IL prevention.Quote from: Beparanf on June 04, 2023, 01:52:36 PMAlso is transferring from Zksync wallet to Zksync wallet is allowed instead of using the bridge for transfer of ETH Zksync era?Might not be a good idea cause you ger flagged as farmer or sybil user. Might as well use bridges alone.

comments.author: Beparanf
comments.body: Quote from: cryptoaddictchie on June 04, 2023, 02:05:41 PMMight not be a good idea cause you ger flagged as farmer or sybil user. Might as well use bridges alone. Quote from: asriloni on June 04, 2023, 02:01:42 PMIt will be far better to be done through official bridge. Bridging through official bridge is a must. It could become the main qualification. That's what im thinking about that. That's why people agreed to pay the high fees for bridging from ethereum to the zksync through official bridge. Thanks for this information. I’m not familiar on the sybil term but lucky I only transfer once on my regular metamask account to ledger account. I do this so that I can hold my tokens to a more secure wallet after I bridge all of my tokens that I purchased on the DEX.So the use of DEX is the one that needs to do regularly right? I will bridge again tomorrow on my ledger wallet to make at least one bridge on my wallet.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: Beparanf on June 04, 2023, 05:00:29 PMSo the use of DEX is the one that needs to do regularly right? I will bridge again tomorrow on my ledger wallet to make at least one bridge on my wallet. Its likely be of. But only use it to your benefit not due to airdrop. Remember this is a speculation, so why not use that to do trading buy low and sell high, its bettet to use these protocol to our advantage as well. Specially the airdrop isnt sure.Try to copy the wallet to the link Ive posted here. Youll find details or dapps below the ticker and you could use those too to add some interactions on different dapps.

comments.author: Beparanf
comments.body: Quote from: cryptoaddictchie on June 04, 2023, 05:14:46 PMQuote from: Beparanf on June 04, 2023, 05:00:29 PMSo the use of DEX is the one that needs to do regularly right? I will bridge again tomorrow on my ledger wallet to make at least one bridge on my wallet. Its likely be of. But only use it to your benefit not due to airdrop. Remember this is a speculation, so why not use that to do trading buy low and sell high, its bettet to use these protocol to our advantage as well. Specially the airdrop isnt sure.I made a decent profit on buying $Space and ZKPad last week while I manage to buy back again on this current dip. The low liquidity on Zksync makes trading on this chain very profitable if you enter on the right time. What type of project do you recommend to purchased on this chain. I’m currently investing only on DeFi and launchpad since I’m assuming this sector will be boom the most when the money flow on this chain.Quote from: cryptoaddictchie on June 04, 2023, 05:14:46 PMTry to copy the wallet to the link Ive posted here. Youll find details or dapps below the ticker and you could use those too to add some interactions on different dapps. I’m using already DefiLlama to track TVL and new project that has a potential. What do you think about meme coins on Zksync?

comments.author: Bitstar_coin
comments.body: Directly bridging from l1 to l2 using the era bridge is much recommended, the number of times you interact solely depends on your capacity financially. But doing it monthly in few times will perhaps place you in a much better position. And also interact with some of the known dapps too. I think so far i have done pretty well for myself base on my financial capacity. Hopefully the effort will be met with a deserving rewarded.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: Beparanf on June 08, 2023, 04:20:50 PMI’m using already DefiLlama to track TVL and new project that has a potential. What do you think about meme coins on Zksync?Wow thats good for you dude. Congrats! Im not sure on the meme side of zksync cause most degens are probably still on bsc, eth, avax or arbitrum. Well better to check some potential one right. But traded some zkape on zksync still down due to the market condition but well see whats gonna be if the market got some uptrend trajectory.

comments.author: Beparanf
comments.body: @cryptoaddictchie is there any news about the possible airdrop of this project. I already lost track on the development update but I still bridge once a month but never trade on DEX there since it’s to volatile for all the project right now in there.I’m wondering if there’s still a plan for launching their own native token because it’s taking a lot of time since most of the blockchain that developed same time with them already launched their own airdrop. Are you still bridging on this L2 project?

comments.author: Bitstar_coin
comments.body: Quote from: Beparanf on September 28, 2023, 12:17:36 PM@cryptoaddictchie is there any news about the possible airdrop of this project. I already lost track on the development update but I still bridge once a month but never trade on DEX there since it’s to volatile for all the project right now in there.I’m wondering if there’s still a plan for launching their own native token because it’s taking a lot of time since most of the blockchain that developed same time with them already launched their own airdrop. Are you still bridging on this L2 project?If you mean an official ann or what is close, there are none everything is based on speculations, farmers keep farming zksync in the hope there will be future airdrop, since a native token is confirmed farmers just go with that mindset.My advice is to continue interacting on a weekly and monthly basis, there are low-cost interaction strategies posted by some of the Twitter airdrop chads   maybe you can have a look to cut some transaction costs.

comments.author: fapar
comments.body: Quote from: Bitstar_coin on September 28, 2023, 12:41:06 PMQuote from: Beparanf on September 28, 2023, 12:17:36 PM@cryptoaddictchie is there any news about the possible airdrop of this project. I already lost track on the development update but I still bridge once a month but never trade on DEX there since it’s to volatile for all the project right now in there.I’m wondering if there’s still a plan for launching their own native token because it’s taking a lot of time since most of the blockchain that developed same time with them already launched their own airdrop. Are you still bridging on this L2 project?If you mean an official ann or what is close, there are none everything is based on speculations, farmers keep farming zksync in the hope there will be future airdrop, since a native token is confirmed farmers just go with that mindset.My advice is to continue interacting on a weekly and monthly basis, there are low-cost interaction strategies posted by some of the Twitter airdrop chads   maybe you can have a look to cut some transaction costs.  Amid anticipation of the retrodrop, the number of zkSynk transactions exceeded the number of Ethereum transactions. I can say that exchanging major coins/tokens on SyncSwap is very convenient and inexpensive; trade on ZigZag, but the number of users and therefore actual transactions is still very small. The prospects for using zkSynk are enormous. Of course, other L2 projects are not sitting idle, but zkSynk is one of the first in terms of the amount of investment and support of third-party developers/users.

comments.author: Psynthax
comments.body: i have the gut feeling that the eligibility one of them would be bridging through the official bridges available.things might not be as complicated as many pictured out to be like the need to mint NFTs and the likes just bridging and interacting with smart contract already suffice but i can understand the need to do all task to ensure eligibility.

comments.author: Beparanf
comments.body: Quote from: Bitstar_coin on September 28, 2023, 12:41:06 PMQuote from: Beparanf on September 28, 2023, 12:17:36 PM@cryptoaddictchie is there any news about the possible airdrop of this project. I already lost track on the development update but I still bridge once a month but never trade on DEX there since it’s to volatile for all the project right now in there.I’m wondering if there’s still a plan for launching their own native token because it’s taking a lot of time since most of the blockchain that developed same time with them already launched their own airdrop. Are you still bridging on this L2 project?If you mean an official ann or what is close, there are none everything is based on speculations, farmers keep farming zksync in the hope there will be future airdrop, since a native token is confirmed farmers just go with that mindset.My advice is to continue interacting on a weekly and monthly basis, there are low-cost interaction strategies posted by some of the Twitter airdrop chads   maybe you can have a look to cut some transaction costs.  I keep bridging tokens even though the fee is very high every month. I stop trading interactions since most of the coins in there is garbage. I only stake my ETH on the defi but I still feel that I’m just waiting time and money with this ridiculous bridging since there’s no slightest sign of airdrop for users. The bridge outside the ZKera took 48hrs on my last bridge so I just keep my balance in there. The problem is my money just stuck with just minimal profit from staking while I can earn more if I invest it on other project.

comments.author: ShinyStarPrincess
comments.body: Quote from: Beparanf on June 04, 2023, 01:52:36 PMQuote from: cryptoaddictchie on June 04, 2023, 01:21:11 PMSo Ive seen this post from Twitter about zksync checker.https://byfishh.github.io/zk-flowKindly check your wallet to see how is the activity of your wallet for the airdrop. Thanks for sharing this website.There is no clue really, just be active in the blockchain at least a couple of days a month and I recommend you to have the Gitcoin Passport

comments.author: $crypto$
comments.body: Quote from: Beparanf on September 28, 2023, 12:17:36 PM@cryptoaddictchie is there any news about the possible airdrop of this project. I already lost track on the development update but I still bridge once a month but never trade on DEX there since it’s to volatile for all the project right now in there.I’m wondering if there’s still a plan for launching their own native token because it’s taking a lot of time since most of the blockchain that developed same time with them already launched their own airdrop. Are you still bridging on this L2 project?I've stopped bridging on this project and other Dexes for a few months, maybe I've fallen behind due to low transaction volume, even though there were a lot of junk tokens during the zksync brigde hype. Many speculations say the same, as they will launch tokens continue some say in early 2024 or Q1 this of course is still unclear because there is no confirmation whatsoever from their side.Bridging the L2 project has not been long, maybe in the future it will continue my heavy burden of expensive fees.Always think if you have to be willing to spend a lot of money it's better to use it for sports betting, that's my thought.

comments.author: fapar
comments.body: Quote from: $crypto$ on September 29, 2023, 03:05:18 AMQuote from: Beparanf on September 28, 2023, 12:17:36 PM@cryptoaddictchie is there any news about the possible airdrop of this project. I already lost track on the development update but I still bridge once a month but never trade on DEX there since it’s to volatile for all the project right now in there.I’m wondering if there’s still a plan for launching their own native token because it’s taking a lot of time since most of the blockchain that developed same time with them already launched their own airdrop. Are you still bridging on this L2 project?I've stopped bridging on this project and other Dexes for a few months, maybe I've fallen behind due to low transaction volume, even though there were a lot of junk tokens during the zksync brigde hype. Many speculations say the same, as they will launch tokens continue some say in early 2024 or Q1 this of course is still unclear because there is no confirmation whatsoever from their side.Bridging the L2 project has not been long, maybe in the future it will continue my heavy burden of expensive fees.Always think if you have to be willing to spend a lot of money it's better to use it for sports betting, that's my thought. The number of projects is growing and the number of Sybil attacks is growing in proportion to them. The most recent are the “activities” around Starknet. I've been working with zkSync for the last few days and I can note a couple of drawbacks: there is no direct switching between zkSync-lite and zkSync-era; There are many bridges, but most of them have a limit on the number of blockchains/tokens used. It's interesting to use, but not always convenient.

comments.author: JeffBrad12
comments.body: Quote from: Bitstar_coin on September 28, 2023, 12:41:06 PMQuote from: Beparanf on September 28, 2023, 12:17:36 PM@cryptoaddictchie is there any news about the possible airdrop of this project. I already lost track on the development update but I still bridge once a month but never trade on DEX there since it’s to volatile for all the project right now in there.I’m wondering if there’s still a plan for launching their own native token because it’s taking a lot of time since most of the blockchain that developed same time with them already launched their own airdrop. Are you still bridging on this L2 project?If you mean an official ann or what is close, there are none everything is based on speculations, farmers keep farming zksync in the hope there will be future airdrop, since a native token is confirmed farmers just go with that mindset.My advice is to continue interacting on a weekly and monthly basis, there are low-cost interaction strategies posted by some of the Twitter airdrop chads   maybe you can have a look to cut some transaction costs.  yea interacting with some projects inside the blockchain that also rumoured to have airdrop in the future also good idea, basically hitting two birds with one stone.right now the fee was cheaper than it was back then though I remembered a transaction even in zksync L2 need about $3 meanwhile bridging ethereum to zksysnc need $60 which is crazy now things different I think its worth it to try zksync again in hope that there will be airdrop but shouldn't get surprised when the rewards is low because zksync if im not wrong already hitting more than 2 million unique address you do the math it will not be that massive rewards anymore.therefore its up to you whether you still try to interact with the blockchain.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: Beparanf on September 28, 2023, 12:17:36 PMI’m wondering if there’s still a plan for launching their own native token because it’s taking a lot of time since most of the blockchain that developed same time with them already launched their own airdrop. Are you still bridging on this L2 project?Yes they have hinted before about their airdrop and potential launched. Im not sure why it took them so long to release maybe because the market is still not good and they are aiming it when the bull is there. Lots of airdrop tokens arent that much have raised their price so if you think about it. So they are not gonna tried to have a lousy launch.

comments.author: cheezcarls
comments.body: Quote from: cryptoaddictchie on June 04, 2023, 01:21:11 PMSo Ive seen this post from Twitter about zksync checker.https://byfishh.github.io/zk-flowKindly check your wallet to see how is the activity of your wallet for the airdrop. Important details are well ntoed there like number of transactions, volume, gas fee spend and even dapps that you interacted on the zkysync network. Hope this gotta be helpful for everyone doing farm there.PS: Feel free to share your screenshot and feedback hows the details on your part? Recently checked mine. Since I am just on a budget, my transactions have not yet reached 100 but I am getting there. But when it comes to Sybil checker with zkSync ERA, I usually go to Trustalabs. https://trustgo.trustalabs.ai/searchIt also includes the number of transactions, volume and the platforms that we have interacted. I only stick to one burner wallet as I do not want to waste all of the time and effort that I have in order not to be tagged as Sybil. But of course, I make sure to install third party security layers like Rabby Wallet, Wallet Guard, Pocket Universe, Avast Antivirus, etc., and also disconnecting and revoking permissions in Revoke Cash when I do not use their platforms.
